meanings.definition: The action of officially declaring information to be no longer classified.
meanings.sent1: The declassification of the documents allowed everyone to see them.
meanings.sent2: The declassification of the report revealed important details.
meanings.sent3: The declassification of the recipe for the secret sauce made everyone a chef!
meanings.sent4: The declassification of the treasure map led to a thrilling adventure.
meanings.sent5: The declassification of the old photo brought back cherished memories.

meanings.definition: The process of making previously classified information available to the public.
meanings.sent1: After the declassification, the public could access the files.
meanings.sent2: The declassification of the files was a significant step towards transparency.
meanings.sent3: The declassification of the magic trick amazed the audience!
meanings.sent4: The declassification of the mystery novel kept readers on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent5: The declassification of the historical documents shed light on the past.
